text: Yo pani yastai kitaba ho jasala'i hamile utareka chaum jo dherai kalyanakari cha, pahilaka kitabaharula'i pramanita gardacha ra yasa karanale ki tapa'ile makka ra tyasako che'ucha'uma basne manisaharula'i dara'una saknuhos, ra juna manisaharule akhiratako dinama visvasa gardachan, tiniharu jastaile yasa kitabama yi pani astha rakhdachan ra aphna namajaharubare nityata gardaichan
